news.title: Babyshambles' Adam Ficek pays tribute to late bandmate Patrick Walden following London date on comeback tour
news.summary: Adam Ficek says Babyshambles’ emotional Brixton show marked “an important part of the band’s grieving process” following Patrick Walden’s death.

news.title: Reactions pour in after Ireland's victory over Hungary: "Stick that up your bollox Viktor Orbán"
news.summary: KNEECAP, Wallfella, Bressie and more took to social media to celebrate the win.

news.title: Album Review: Celeste, Woman Of Faces
news.summary: Excellent effort from English soul star. 8/10

news.title: 85 years ago today: Luke Kelly was born in Dublin
news.summary: To mark what would've been Luke Kelly's 85th birthday, we're sharing some special tributes from Christy Moore, Ralph McTell and John Sheahan – all selected from the Hot Press archives

news.title: Saoirse Ronan wins BAFTA Scotland Award for The Outrun
news.summary: Ronan called the film an “incredible team effort” and thanked the people of Orkney.
